Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'It is an ordinary afternoon of an ordinary vacation where ordinary work is being handled.'}
{3: 'Everything flows along at its usual pace until a flash of crimson yanks open the door to the Gray Raven lounge.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Tch, aren't you looking swell?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera?', 3: '9', 4: 'Why are you in this frame... Did you just finish a mission?', 5: '9'}
{3: "You hurriedly put down your report and prepare to stand up to see what is happening outside, only to be firmly pushed back into your seat by Vera's hand."}
{3: 'She examines you carefully from head to toe, sets down the two packages in her hands, and the usual mischievous expression returns to her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Do you know there are rumors everywhere about your death?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So what's actually going on? Let me see.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After pondering for a moment, you finally recall injuring your arm last week during an exchange training with Hellhound.'}
{2: '(Roll up sleeve)', 3: '19', 4: 'You mean this?', 5: '19'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hellhound...? Looks like they're looking for trouble again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You just have some antiseptic dressing on, so it's only a minor injury, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Who knows what kind of telephone game is being played out there... It's truly ridiculous.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It was just a scratch. I took care of it myself.', 3: '24', 4: "Can't you show a little concern for me?", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Always putting on a brave face... One day you'll be in real trouble and no one will even notice.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's fine. You noticed, and you came all this way to check on me.", 3: '26'}
{3: 'Following your gaze, Vera notices the two packages she tossed onto the table earlier.'}
{2: 'You brought these for me?', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is my concern not enough for you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera pats the two packages on the table.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "If you're curious, sit still and behave yourself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera swiftly unwraps the packages, revealing the rather unexpected contents inside.'}
{3: 'A basic first aid kit and a fruit basket.'}
{2: "...I didn't think you were really here to check on me.", 3: '39', 4: "I didn't expect a care package with a fruit basket...", 5: '39'}
{3: "You do not know what is going through Vera's mind as she pulls out a fruit knife and begins to peel an apple."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm not just here to check on you. I also happen to have some matters I need to confirm with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Something you need to confirm with me...?', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I just remembered that you didn't get a chance to eat the last apple I peeled for you as well, ha.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'When you "last"?', 3: '47', 4: 'When did you ever peel an apple for me?', 5: '47'}
{3: 'Vera does not continue immediately as if suddenly lost in some distant memory.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Oh, I must have remembered it wrong.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera deftly peels the fruit, cuts it into small pieces, and hands one to you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Try it. I'll go back and have a word with the vendor if it isn't sweet. Go on.", 4: '1'}
